channel.title: Think outside the box
channel.description: A place we I talk to myself. But you can listen, too.

item.title: Welcome
item.description: This is the first time I make a website. I donâ€™t know why I want to do this. Maybe because I am going to graduate next semester and and start my developer career. And maybe building a website is a good begining. With this website, I am going to share things that I think they helpfull or funny for orther people. Again, welcome!. Connect me on Facebook and take a look on my github repositories.
